note:
Technology and politics. Those are my things. I like to debate and I believe debate is necessary for society to survive, even if we don’t agree in the end. Don’t take it personally. I question everything and want things to be factual and accurate. Just because I correct you on something doesn’t mean I agree or disagree with you. It just means you were inaccurate.

I will generally differentiate between my opinion and factual arguments. If I don’t, ask.
